casebody.data:
VILLEPIGUE
v.
CITY OF DANVILLE, et al. No. 278P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 11, 2008. David E. Blum, for Villepigue. Dan M. Hartzog, Kari R. Johnson, Raleigh, for City of Danville, Va., et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of July 2008 by Petitioner for Admission Pro Hac Vice of David E. Blum:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of December 2008."
